FreshieAnswered on 25 Sep 2018Being an angel investor requires many things, including $$ to invest in the first place, time and the knowledge/experience to meet, assess and evaluate startups, etc. Here are some relevant articles posted on AngelCentral that might be able to help you get started, hope it helps!0 comments0
